meta.title: Malta Suitability Check - Dr. Werner & Partners
meta.description: Find out if Malta is the right location for you. 12-14 questions for your personalised analysis.

results_cta_bar.subtitle: Secure your free initial consultation now

error_messages.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.

welcome.title: Malta Suitability Check
welcome.description: Find out if Malta is the right location for you and your business. Answer 14 short questions and receive a detailed evaluation of your suitability score.

questions.text: Which best describes your business situation?
questions.helper: Choose the option that best applies to you.

options.label: I plan to start a completely new business in Malta
I have an existing business (under 500k EUR turnover)
I have an established business (500k - 2 million EUR)
I have a larger business (over 2 million EUR)
I'd like to explore first / prefer not to say

questions.text: How internationally oriented is (or will be) your business?

options.label: Mainly local, but open to international expansion
Mix of local and international clients
Still planning / prefer not to say

questions.text: Are you willing to relocate to Malta and spend at least 183 days per year there?
Which business model best describes your company?

options.label: Local service with personal customer contact

questions.text: Can you establish genuine economic substance in Malta (office, employees, management)?

options.label: No, only letterbox company without activity
Moderate substance (small office, 1-2 local part-time employees)
Full substance (own office, several full-time employees, on-site management)

questions.text: Are you willing to accept higher compliance requirements?
questions.helper: Malta is subject to stricter EU regulations than many other jurisdictions. If you're unsure, select "Unsure".

options.label: Unsure / would like to learn more
Yes, if the benefits are appropriate
Yes, full compliance is important to me

questions.text: Do you already have or plan to have establishments in other countries?
questions.helper: This refers to physical locations (offices, branches, subsidiaries) - not just international clients.

options.label: Not yet, but planned for the future
Yes, one establishment in another country

questions.text: How would you assess your profitability?

options.label: Prefer not to say / don't know yet

questions.text: Where will actual management and strategic decision-making take place?

options.label: Entirely in my current home country
Predominantly in home country, partially Malta
Balanced between Malta and other countries
Entirely in Malta (board meetings, strategic decisions)

questions.text: Do you plan to hold or acquire participations through your Malta company?

options.label: Yes, multiple participations / complex holding structure

questions.text: How important is access to the EU single market and EU legal recognition?

options.label: Not important, have no EU clients

questions.text: What is your family situation regarding a Malta relocation?

options.label: Family sceptical, but could be convinced
Family supports relocation / single without obligations

questions.helper: Provide your contact details so we can send you access to your results.

quotes.q001: This question helps us assess the effort required to continue or establish your business in Malta.
quotes.q002: International orientation is crucial - Malta offers particular advantages for cross-border business models.
quotes.q003: Residence is a critical factor. For optimal tax benefits, you should spend at least 183 days in Malta.
quotes.q004: Different business models benefit differently from Malta. Digital businesses and holdings are particularly suitable.
quotes.q005: Genuine economic substance is not only legally required, but also the key to tax recognition.
quotes.q006: Compliance readiness is crucial. Malta follows EU standards - meaning higher requirements, but also legal certainty and reputation.
quotes.q007: With multiple physical establishments, Malta as an EU location offers strategic advantages for holding structures and coordination.
quotes.q008: Malta is particularly worthwhile with high margins. The effective tax burden can be significantly reduced.
quotes.q009: Actual management must take place in Malta - this is the basis for tax recognition.
quotes.q010: Malta offers excellent conditions for holding structures with tax-free dividends from participations.
quotes.q011: As an EU member, Malta offers full access to the single market - a decisive advantage over non-EU countries.
quotes.q012: The family situation is often an underestimated factor. Malta offers high quality of life for families.

form.privacy_label: I agree to the Privacy Policy. I also agree to receive emails related to the Malta Suitability Check.

trust_elements.title: 100% GDPR Compliant
trust_elements.description: Your data is processed and secured according to GDPR standards.

trust_elements.title: SSL-Encrypted Transfer
trust_elements.description: All data is transmitted encrypted and stored securely.

trust_elements.title: No Sharing With Third Parties
trust_elements.description: Your information remains confidential and is not shared with third parties.

trust_elements.title: Opt-Out Anytime
trust_elements.description: You can unsubscribe from emails at any time. No spam, only relevant information.

header.benchmark_text: Our assessment follows strict criteria to ensure long-term success in Malta. The average result of our clients is 58 points ‚Äì your result shows how well your individual situation fits Malta.

excellent.label: Very Good Suitability
excellent.title: Malta is very well suited for you
excellent.subtitle: Your situation is very well suited for a Malta structure. Let's discuss the details and plan your next steps.
benefits: Tax optimisation through Malta structure (eff. 5% possible)
EU market access with minimal barriers

good.label: Good Suitability
good.title: Malta is well suited for you
good.subtitle: With proper planning, this is a promising step. Our experts will show you the optimal path forward.
benefits: Analysis of your individual optimisation potential
Concrete Malta structure for your business

moderate.label: Conditional Suitability
moderate.title: Malta is conditionally suitable
moderate.subtitle: Malta offers interesting opportunities for you. A case-by-case review is recommended. We'll show you what steps are necessary.
benefits: What requirements you still need to meet

fair.label: Limited Suitability
fair.title: Malta could be suitable
fair.subtitle: A detailed case-by-case review is required. Let's work together to find the best approach for your situation.
benefits: Detailed feasibility analysis for your case

explore.label: Further Review Required
explore.title: Let's Talk
explore.subtitle: Your situation is complex and requires individual consultation. Together we'll find the best solution for you.
benefits: Complete analysis of your starting position
Malta vs. other locations: What suits you?
